DOC.brief_summary: Laryngoscopy endotracheal intubation cause significant hemodynamic response thus present increase risk patient undergoing cardiac bypass surgery . Prevention reduction increment important hemodynamic control . In randomized single blind study , aim study compare hemodynamic response two different laryngoscopy technique Glidescope Macintosh laryngoscope coronary cardiac bypass surgery patient .
DOC.brief_title: Does Glidescope Video Laryngoscope Related Less Hemodynamic Response ?
DOC.detailed_description: Laryngoscopy endotracheal intubation cause significant hemodynamic response thus present increase risk patient undergoing cardiac bypass surgery . Prevention reduction increment important hemodynamic control . In randomized single blind study , aim study compare hemodynamic response two different laryngoscopy technique Glidescope Macintosh laryngoscope coronary cardiac bypass surgery patient . After induction institutional protocol cardiac bypass surgery , hemodynamic data include heart rate , systolic diastolic arterial pressure data record . Time intubation , age , sex , ASA status data also record .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical Status 23 Patients undergoing elective cardiac bypass surgery Difficult intubation history Need Rapid sequence intubation alternative intubation method Emergency procedures Patients predictive factor difficult intubation Patients permanent pacemaker
